repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This drama is written by SundararājaSūri . Very few manuscriopts of this drama are known.

msItem.title: Vaidarbhīvāsudevanāṭaka
msItem.author: SundararājaSūri
msItem.incipit: (aṅka-1 1v 1) śrīmān bhānusutātdukulavilasannānā vihāro harisurjajñābhava yoṣadharmavi (aṅka-1 1v 2) haradrāmānubhāvotsukaḥ
msItem.explicit: (aṅka-5 14r 3) ne bata vardhitaṃ sūtranibandhakaraḥ parābhutukatyakāṃ pariritavān khalu . 35 . uttiṣṭha . 2. ௳

support.p: Brown thick rough wooden guard folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil Numerals in left margin. Each Aṅka of the drama is numbered separately. The number of Aṅka is indicated like prathamoṅkaḥ in the left margin but is not consistent.
supportDesc.condition: Very good. Some corners are slightly broken.

handNote.desc: conjunct clusters are not clear. Some times ba is written for va.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ written in left margin on 1v.

After the front guard folio 4 lines are written in Sanskrit and in Granth script. These lines glorify the drama saying the drama written by the SundararājaSūri, the drama named Vaidarbhīvāsudevanāṭaka is constantly praised. Left margin has śrīrastu. B-1v 1 śrīmat keśabamahipālapālyamānapāṇḍyadeśavirājan?lakuśnāmaharivastavyena vikha?ssūtra .. B-1v-4 kāga(rha?)samudbhavena sundararājākhyasuriṇāviracitaṃ vaidarbhīvāsudevābhiyaṃ nāṭakaṃ vijayatetarāṃ.

encodingDesc.p: Sapces are added to separate words. Question mark is used to show doubful reading.

TEI.text:
(aṅka-1 1v 1) śūbhamastu śrīmateveṃkaṭeśāya namaḥ | śrīmān bhānusutātdukulavilasannānā vihāro harisurjajñābhava yoṣadharmavi (aṅka-1 1v 2) haradrāmānubhāvotsukaḥ
(aṅka-5 14r 1) paśya śibupāladaśāṃ . 32. bhadre namaste yatastvayā rakṣitā mamāṃguli (aṅka-5 14r 2) śiśupāladantāt . 33 . kṣuriṇaḥ ? śrutivan nandehi . 34. āyyamuhurtta dakṣiṇāṃ vita?tpati kāmātalaṃ purakramya mā (aṅka-5 14r 3) ne bata vardhitaṃ sūtranibandhakaraḥ parābhutukatyakāṃ pariritavān khalu . 35. uttiṣṭha . 2. . ௳ pañcamoṅkaḥ ௳ (aṅka-5 14r 4) śrikṛṣṇāya namaḥ ௳
